title: Pset_MaterialHygroscopic
description: A set of hygroscopic properties of materials.

UpperVaporResistanceFactor.title: UpperVaporResistanceFactor
UpperVaporResistanceFactor.description: The vapor permeability relationship of air/material (typically value > 1), measured in high relative humidity (typically in 95/50 % RH).

LowerVaporResistanceFactor.title: LowerVaporResistanceFactor
LowerVaporResistanceFactor.description: The vapor permeability relationship of air/material (typically value > 1), measured in low relative humidity (typically in 0/50 % RH).

VaporPermeability.title: VaporPermeability
VaporPermeability.description: The rate of water vapor transmission per unit area per unit of vapor pressure differential under test conditions.

MoistureDiffusivity.title: MoistureDiffusivity
MoistureDiffusivity.description: Moisture diffusivity is a transport property that is frequently used in the hygrothermal analysis of building envelope components.
